title: SubmitFormSnippet
description: A template with two states: a SimpleSnippet and another that contains a form

richText.description: Text with HTML subset allowed: i, b, u, strong, em, br

locale.description: Two to five character string for the locale code

country.description: Two character string for the country code (used for SMS)

allof.description: snippet title displayed before snippet text

allOf.description: Main body text of snippet. HTML subset allowed: i, b, u, strong, em, br

scene1_section_title_icon.description: Section title icon for scene 1. 16x16px. SVG or PNG preferred. scene1_section_title_text must also be specified to display.

scene1_section_title_icon_dark_theme.description: Section title icon for scene 1, dark theme variant. 16x16px. SVG or PNG preferred. scene1_section_title_text must also be specified to display.

scene1_section_title_text.description: Section title text for scene 1. scene1_section_title_icon must also be specified to display.

allOf.description: A url, scene1_section_title_text links to this
Title displayed before text in scene 2. Should be plain text.
Main body text of snippet. HTML subset allowed: i, b, u, strong, em, br

scene1_icon.description: Snippet icon. 64x64px. SVG or PNG preferred.

scene1_icon_dark_theme.description: Snippet icon. Dark theme variant. 64x64px. SVG or PNG preferred.

scene1_icon_alt_text.description: Alt text describing scene1 icon for screen readers

scene1_title_icon.description: Small icon that shows up before the title / text. 16x16px. SVG or PNG preferred. Grayscale.

scene1_title_icon_dark_theme.description: Small icon that shows up before the title / text. Dark theme variant. 16x16px. SVG or PNG preferred. Grayscale.

scene1_title_icon_alt_text.description: Alt text describing scene1 title icon for screen readers

success_title.description: (send to device) Title shown before text on successful registration.

scene2_email_placeholder_text.description: Value to show while input is empty.

scene2_input_placeholder.description: (send to device) Value to show while input is empty.

scene2_privacy_html.description: Information about how the form data is used.

scene2_disclaimer_html.description: (send to device) Html for disclaimer and link underneath input box.

scene2_dismiss_button_text.description: Label for the dismiss button when the sign-up form is expanded.

scene2_icon.description: (send to device) Image to display above the form. 98x98px. SVG or PNG preferred.

scene2_icon_dark_theme.description: (send to device) Image to display above the form. Dark theme variant. 98x98px. SVG or PNG preferred.

scene2_icon_alt_text.description: Alt text describing scene2 icon for screen readers

scene2_newsletter.description: Newsletter/basket id user is subscribing to. Must be a value from the 'Slug' column here: https://basket.mozilla.org/news/. Default 'mozilla-foundation'.

hidden_inputs.description: Each entry represents a hidden input, key is used as value for the name property.

allOf.description: Text for a button next to main snippet text that links to button_url. Requires button_url.

scene1_button_color.description: The text color of the button. Valid CSS color.

scene1_button_background_color.description: The background color of the button. Valid CSS color.

allOf.description: Text for the button in the event of a submission error/failure.

do_not_autoblock.description: Used to prevent blocking the snippet after the CTA (link or button) has been clicked

include_sms.description: (send to device) Allow users to send an SMS message with the form?

message_id_sms.description: (send to device) Newsletter/basket id representing the SMS message to be sent.

message_id_email.description: (send to device) Newsletter/basket id representing the email message to be sent. Must be a value from the 'Slug' column here: https://basket.mozilla.org/news/.

utm_campaign.description: (fxa) Value to pass through to GA as utm_campaign.

utm_term.description: (fxa) Value to pass through to GA as utm_term.

allOf.description: The url where the link points to.

metric.description: Custom event name sent with telemetry event.
